choices.name: choiceAddDays
choices.choiceText: Add days to original record's dates

choices.name: choiceFixedDates
choices.choiceText: Choose start and end dates for all cloned records

Flow.description: add Don't clone products; add Registration Values from Target Session toggle merged with additional form fields
Flow.label: The Great Cloner V3

fields.name: Number_of_Days_to_Add
fields.helpText: Optionally enter a number of days to add to all dates in the cloned records. For example, to set all cloned records one year ahead of the original records, enter 365.

fields.name: Toggle_Header
fields.fieldText:
Update Record Names

Flip this toggle to Active to update any instance of the Session Name or Session Code in a record's name (e.g. "Baseball Spring 2022" cloned into a Summer 2022 Session would become "Baseball Summer 2022")


Note: This toggle will only update the records that have the Session Name appended at the end of the record name. You will have the opportunity to manually update the record names throughout this process.

fields.name: Toggle_Header_Reg_From_Session
fields.fieldText: Take Registration Values from Target Session

value.stringValue: Take Registration Values from Target Session
Don't Take Registration Values from Target Session

fields.name: dontCloneProductsText
fields.fieldText: Don't Clone Course Session Product

fields.name: Confirmation_Screen_Msg
fields.fieldText: Success! Make any needed changes to the tables below. Changes will not be committed until you click Commit Changes.

fields.name: NameUpdates
fields.fieldText:
Updating Record Names


The first column in both tables "Course Session Name" and "Course Option Name" represent the current/original name of the records.


⚠️ To update that name, click on the pencil icon in the second column "Target Course Session Name" or "Target Course Option Name" and enter the desired name.


Upon clicking "Commit Changes", the "Course Session Name" and the "Course Option Name" will update with the values you've entered in the second column.

fields.name: End_Screen_Msg
fields.fieldText: The record clone is in progress. You will be notified by an email once the clone is successfully completed.

fields.name: Error_CSOs_Not_Found_Screen_Msg

Hmm... something went wrong.


We couldn't find any records matching your criteria. Please check the Program and Session and try again.

textTemplates.name: queryString
textTemplates.text: SELECT Id, TREX1__Course_Session__c, TREX1__Course_Option__c, TREX1__Option_Available__c, TREX1__Available_Online__c FROM TREX1__Course_Session_Option__c WHERE TREX1__Course_Session__r.TREX1__Session__c = '{!Input_Original_Session_Picklist}' AND TREX1__Course_Session__r.TREX1__Course__r.TREX1__Program__c = '{!Input_Program_Picklist}'
